p: The main characteristic experimental vibrations of Cu-Nps are obtained from FT-IR shown in Figure 3. The literature data of IR values were referred to the analysis of the vibrational frequency presence in the compounds. For spectral values of O−H and C−H stretching, the vibration frequency range was obtained at 4000−2000 cm −1. The O−H stretching in water molecules was assigned at 3432 cm −1 for Cu-Nps. The mode of the antisymmetric and the symmetric carboxylate groups was observed at 1593 cm −1 (s, FT-IR) and 1391 cm −1(vs. FT-IR), respectively. Biphenyl group was found in the IR range between 1600 and 1400 cm −1, respectively. The COOH bends and C-N (Bz) stretching modes was observed at 1235 cm −1, respectively.
